text:
Hi All! :wave:
*TLDR:*  Can the *Form creator,* found through *Marketing* > *Lead Capture* > *Forms,* group radio buttons inside HTML fieldset and legend tags?

Iâ€™ve been asked by my team to fix an ADA issue on a form missing <fieldset> and <legend> tags to group multiple radio buttons. We use the Form creator to analyze traffic, views, and submissions.
